dc_title_s: Map of a part of the middle portion of Miami River Basin  showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Prepared by ALFRED C. WALKER, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Scale bar lower right corner of map.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the middle portion of the Miami River Basin and quality of underground water.
